dataset_id: Atlantic High Latitude Downward Longwave Irradiance - Multimission
title: Atlantic High Latitude Downward Longwave Irradiance - Multimission
summary: Daily averaged estimation of the Downward Longwave Irradiance reaching the Earth surface, derived from AVHRR on NOAA and Metop polar orbiting satellites. The product covers the Atlantic High Latitudes, is delivered on a 5km polar stereographic grid and expressed in W/m2.
